pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.1_0: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.2_0: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ—āpattādhikaraṇaṁ …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ—āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
